registers.name: CTRL
registers.description: OTP Controller Control and Status Register

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: OTP write and read access address register

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_BUSY
enumeratedValues.description: No write or read access to OTP started.

enumeratedValues.name: BUSY
enumeratedValues.description: Write or read access to OTP started.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: Error - access to a locked region requested.

enumeratedValues.name: SHADOW_NOFORCE_RELOAD
enumeratedValues.description: Do not force shadow register re-load.

enumeratedValues.name: SHADOW_FORCE_RELOAD
enumeratedValues.description: Force shadow register re-load. This bit is cleared automatically after shadow registers are re-loaded.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_KEY
enumeratedValues.description: OTP write access is locked.

enumeratedValues.name: KEY
enumeratedValues.description: OTP write access is unlocked.

registers.name: CTRL_SET
registers.description: OTP Controller Control and Status Register

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: OTP write and read access address register

registers.name: CTRL_CLR
registers.description: OTP Controller Control and Status Register

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: OTP write and read access address register

registers.name: CTRL_TOG
registers.description: OTP Controller Control and Status Register

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: OTP write and read access address register

registers.name: TIMING
registers.description: OTP Controller Timing Register

registers.name: DATA
registers.description: OTP Controller Write Data Register

fields.name: DATA
fields.description: Used to initiate a write to OTP. See the section for operating details.

registers.name: READ_CTRL
registers.description: OTP Controller Write Data Register

registers.name: READ_FUSE_DATA
registers.description: OTP Controller Read Data Register

fields.name: DATA
fields.description: The data read from OTP. See the section for operating details.

registers.name: SW_STICKY
registers.description: Sticky bit Register

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: The writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: The writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked. Once this bit is set, it is always high unless a POR is issued.

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked. Once this bit is set, it is always high unless a POR is issued.

registers.name: SCS
registers.description: Software Controllable Signals Register

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_dbg_dis
enumeratedValues.description: JTAG debugging is not enabled by the HAB (it may still be enabled by other mechanisms).

enumeratedValues.name: jtag_dbg_en
enumeratedValues.description: JTAG debugging is enabled by the HAB (though this signal may be gated off).

fields.name: SPARE
fields.description: Unallocated read/write bits for implementation specific software use.

enumeratedValues.name: unlocked
enumeratedValues.description: Bits in this register are unlocked.

enumeratedValues.name: locked
enumeratedValues.description: Bits in this register are locked. When set, all of the bits in this register are locked and can not be changed through SW programming. After this bit is set, it can only be cleared by a POR.

registers.name: SCS_SET
registers.description: Software Controllable Signals Register

fields.name: SPARE
fields.description: Unallocated read/write bits for implementation specific software use.

registers.name: SCS_CLR
registers.description: Software Controllable Signals Register

fields.name: SPARE
fields.description: Unallocated read/write bits for implementation specific software use.

registers.name: SCS_TOG
registers.description: Software Controllable Signals Register

fields.name: SPARE
fields.description: Unallocated read/write bits for implementation specific software use.

registers.name: VERSION
registers.description: OTP Controller Version Register

registers.name: TIMING2
registers.description: OTP Controller Timing Register 2

registers.name: LOCK
registers.description: Value of OTP Bank0 Word0 (Lock controls)

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: The writing or reading of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked. The read of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are also blocked

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: Reading of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the reading of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: Writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: Writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: Writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the writing of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: notblocked
enumeratedValues.description: The reading of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are not blocked.

enumeratedValues.name: blocked
enumeratedValues.description: When set, the reading of this region's shadow register and OTP fuse word are blocked.

enumeratedValues.description: The device is a functional part.

enumeratedValues.description: The device is a field returned part.
